ygData.subject: Does Heritrix considers the hash (#) in a URL?
ygData.msgSnippet: It seems to me Heritrix does not consider the hash nor save it in the arc files. It could be useful to add this support. What do you think? Jean-Noel

Subject: Does Heritrix considers the hash (#) in a URL?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=343342970

It seems to me Heritrix does not consider the hash nor save it in the 
arc files. It could be useful to add this support.

What do you think?

Jean-Noel
